about_the_game:
Consisting of 2 Disks with original music for Factorio: Space Age:

  • Disk 1: Factorio: Space Age - Soundtrack - Composer's Mixes. Contains a composer's selection of 17 tracks especially remixed for this album.

  • Disk 2: The original game soundtrack. 50 tracks in total in which 10 of them are a rendered version of the variable ones. You will find for sure your favourite track in this folder : )

10h:31m:49s of original ultra-fine-Factorio music properly mastered to enjoy the Factorio universe without having to play the game.

Available in both mp3 and flac audio formats.

Composed by Petr Wajsar.

Produced by Alexandr Smutny.

name: Factorio: Space Age - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 4200 MB available space
